ctu_text: \n1. Beneficiary women who are not enrolled in Bhamashah should be motivated by all ANMs, Anganwadi workers, Saathins, and Asha Sahyoginis to obtain a Bhamashah card from their nearest e-Mitra center and provide the details to the nearest Anganwadi center or government hospital. \n1. Intensive publicity regarding the above should be conducted through field workers and honorary workers of the Women and Child Development Department and the Medical, Health, and Family Welfare Department.
